verbs.description: [ARG0: russia] [V: drilled] [ARG2: for all out nuclear war] russia frequently shows off its nuclear missiles but has suffered launch failures in the past this kind of failure could bring embarrassment to putin as he tries to confront the us and comes as his popularity is waning with russians ministry band ministry us ministry of defense vladimir putin president russia armed forces
